name: Rat
desc: These guys are everywhere! Alone, not much of an issue, but in large packs, rats can be a serious threat!

name: Lesser Goblin
desc: Tiny evil. Like, pocket evil. Fun-sized evil?

name: Cave Bat
desc: It's a bat. This is a cave. Are you really surprised?

name: Wendigo
desc: Furry icebeast. From the frozen north or something. Not Vanilla Ice.

name: Imp
desc: Some mage with a lack of forethought summoned this fire imp. Hope you have some burn cream.

name: Priest
desc: Ancient priest of a forgotten cult, the priests wield holy magic in attempt to make stuff glowy. Or dead. Or one and then the other.

name: Warlock
desc: While most warlocks are not inherently evil, this one is.

name: Greater Goblin
desc: Lesser Imp's big brother. This guy is a lot more dangerous.
